mapper.select: select colltime, porttype, portid, devaddr, density, tempretu, pressure, diffpres, flow, sumflow, userid, status, retrycnt, PREST, DIFFPT, resetinfo, warninfo from pd.fthfldtl where colltime = #{colltime}

select colltime, porttype, portid, devaddr, density, tempretu, pressure, diffpres, flow, sumflow, userid, status, retrycnt, PREST, DIFFPT, resetinfo, warninfo from pd.fthfldtl limit #{offset}, #{limit}
mapper.insert: insert into pd.fthfldtl(porttype, density, tempretu, pressure, diffpres, flow, sumflow, userid, status, retrycnt, PREST, DIFFPT, resetinfo, warninfo) values (#{porttype}, #{density}, #{tempretu}, #{pressure}, #{diffpres}, #{flow}, #{sumflow}, #{userid}, #{status}, #{retrycnt}, #{prest}, #{diffpt}, #{resetinfo}, #{warninfo})

insert into pd.fthfldtl(porttype, density, tempretu, pressure, diffpres, flow, sumflow, userid, status, retrycnt, PREST, DIFFPT, resetinfo, warninfo) values
(#{entity.porttype}, #{entity.density}, #{entity.tempretu}, #{entity.pressure}, #{entity.diffpres}, #{entity.flow}, #{entity.sumflow}, #{entity.userid}, #{entity.status}, #{entity.retrycnt}, #{entity.prest}, #{entity.diffpt}, #{entity.resetinfo}, #{entity.warninfo})

insert into pd.fthfldtl(porttype, density, tempretu, pressure, diffpres, flow, sumflow, userid, status, retrycnt, PREST, DIFFPT, resetinfo, warninfo) values
(#{entity.porttype}, #{entity.density}, #{entity.tempretu}, #{entity.pressure}, #{entity.diffpres}, #{entity.flow}, #{entity.sumflow}, #{entity.userid}, #{entity.status}, #{entity.retrycnt}, #{entity.prest}, #{entity.diffpt}, #{entity.resetinfo}, #{entity.warninfo})
on duplicate key update porttype = values(porttype) , density = values(density) , tempretu = values(tempretu) , pressure = values(pressure) , diffpres = values(diffpres) , flow = values(flow) , sumflow = values(sumflow) , userid = values(userid) , status = values(status) , retrycnt = values(retrycnt) , PREST = values(PREST) , DIFFPT = values(DIFFPT) , resetinfo = values(resetinfo) , warninfo = values(warninfo)
mapper.update:
update pd.fthfldtl
porttype = #{porttype},
density = #{density},
tempretu = #{tempretu},
pressure = #{pressure},
diffpres = #{diffpres},
flow = #{flow},
sumflow = #{sumflow},
userid = #{userid},
status = #{status},
retrycnt = #{retrycnt},
PREST = #{prest},
DIFFPT = #{diffpt},
resetinfo = #{resetinfo},
warninfo = #{warninfo},
where colltime = #{colltime}
